In full remission: After full criteria for anorexia nervosa were

tained period of time.
Specify current severity:
The minimum level of severity is based, for adults, on current body
mass index (BMI) (see below) or, for children and adolescents, on
BMI percentile. The ranges below are derived from World Health Or-
ganization categories for thinness in adults; for children and adoles-
cents, corresponding BMI percentiles should be used. The level of
severity may be increased to reflect clinical symptoms, the degree
of functional disability, and the need for supervision.
Mild: BMI ≥ 17 kg/m2
Moderate: BMI 16–16.99 kg/m2
Severe: BMI 15–15.99 kg/m2
Extreme: BMI < 15 kg/m2
